alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Gulf and Franklin Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 328 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles southeast of Wewahitchka to Eastpoint to 15 miles southwest of St George Island. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, St George Island, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Franklin, Carrabelle Beach, Buck Siding, Morgan Place, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Royal Bluff, Mcintyre, High Bluff, Yent Place, St George Island St Pk, Tilton, Beverly, Green Point, Bay City and Lanark Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida.
